sentences.en: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.cn: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.en: Bease has been farming for 30 years.
sentences.cn: 比斯经营农场已有30年。

sentences.en: Eisenhower left the White House and retired to his farm in Gettysburg.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔离开白宫，退隐到他在葛底斯堡的农场。

sentences.en: farm animals
sentences.cn: 农场牲畜

sentences.en: farm workers
sentences.cn: 农场工人

sentences.en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentences.cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

sentences.en: His mother inherited a farm worth 15,000 dollars a year.
sentences.cn: 他母亲继承了一处年产值为1.5万美元的农场。

sentences.en: I came to live at the farm by happenstance.
sentences.cn: 我来到该农场住下纯属偶然。

sentences.en: In 1970 the average size of a French farm was 19 hectares.
sentences.cn: 1970年，法国农场的平均规模为19公顷。

sentences.en: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentences.cn: 离老远，我都能听到农机具的突突声。

sentences.en: It reckons that rationing would ossify the farm industry.
sentences.cn: 人们认为实行配给制会使农业失去活力。

sentences.en: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.cn: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

sentences.en: Our man had wisely decided to be picked up at the farm.
sentences.cn: 我们头儿作出了英明决定——让人来农场接他。

sentences.en: Spain imposed levies on farm imports from non-member states.
sentences.cn: 西班牙对来自非成员国的进口农产品征税。

sentences.en: The family has farmed here for generations.
sentences.cn: 这家人世代在此务农。

sentences.en: The farm employed a tractor driver and two general labourers.
sentences.cn: 农场雇用了一名拖拉机手和两名杂工。

sentences.en: The farm is open to the public only during two open-house weekends.
sentences.cn: 该农场仅在两个周末接待日才对公众开放。

sentences.en: They farmed some of the best land in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们耕种着该国最好的一些土地。

sentences.en: They now own and operate a farm 50 miles south of Rochester.
sentences.cn: 他们现在拥有并经营着一家位于罗切斯特以南50英里处的农场。

sentences.en: They ran the general store and the farm dairy.
sentences.cn: 他们经营着杂货店和农场的乳品店。

sentences.en: Will they farm the rest of their land less intensively?
sentences.cn: 他们会在其余土地上实施较轻程度的集约化耕种吗？

sentences.en: Workmen were hired to remodel and enlarge the farm buildings.
sentences.cn: 雇用了工人来改造和扩建农场建筑。

phrases.tran_cn: &I{【棒球】} 分派：将（一名队员）分派到小联合会俱乐部队
畜牧场；禽畜饲养场；牧场
在农场；在农场里，在农场上

trans.tran_en: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals
an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals
If you farm an area of land, you grow crops or keep animals on it
